outline:
1. multitude, abundance, greatness
    1. multitude
      1. abundance, abundantly
      2. numerous
    2. greatness
kjv_def: abundance(-antly), all, [idiom] common (sort), excellent, great(-ly, -ness, number), huge, be increased, long, many, more in number, most, much, multitude, plenty(-ifully), [idiom] very (age).
